Items.Script: The Robot liked the mushroom with a large umbrella-like hat. Having seen enough, it decided to leave the mushroom in a bucket standing here. It also prompted our hero to think that there was someone here, and therefore it hastened to go away into the forest.

But just a few meters from the mushroom clearing, the Robot found a burning fire. The program instructs it to put out the fire if no one controls it. There was no one around, and therefore the hero began to act.
